title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC21006Complex Variables : CauchyÃ¢ÂÂs integral theorem, Fourier transform integrals with singularity, Singularity extraction technique, Branch point integrals. Saddle point, Stationary phase method for evaluation of radiation integrals. Special Functions : Bessel functions, fresnel integrals, etc Computational Techniques : Classification based on integral and differential equation solution, time domain and frequency domain solutions. Introduction to Finite-difference, FDTD, finite element techniques in electromagnetics with applications.
